mapper.insert: insert into email_auth values( #{email}, #{auth_key}, date_add(now(),interval 5 minute), false )
mapper.delete: delete from email_auth where now() >= time_expire or auth_check=true;
mapper.update: update email_auth set auth_key=#{auth_key}, time_expire=date_add(now(),interval 5 minute) where email=#{email}
update email_auth set auth_check=true where email=#{email}
mapper.select: select * from email_auth where email=#{email} and auth_key=#{auth_key} and time_expire >= now()
